original_text: Then Isaiah the prophet came to King Hezekiah, and said to him, “What did these men say? And from where did they come to you?” Hezekiah said, “They have come to me from a far country, from Babylon.”
korean_text: 이에 선지자 이사야가 히스기야 왕에게 나아와 묻되 그 사람들이 무슨 말을 하였으며 어디서 왕에게 왔나이까 하니 히스기야가 이르되 그들이 원방 곧 바벨론에서 내게 왔나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then Isaiah the prophet came to King Hezekiah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 선지자 이사야가 히스기야 왕에게 와서

sentences.original_text: And from where did they come to you?
They have come to me from a far country
